729291f-a.folder: Purdy Place & Seguine Avenue, Staten Island, NY
729291f-a.text:
Purdy Place, at the N. E. corner of Seguine Avenus, showing Purdy's Hotel. The house was huilt in 1690 (see
Robinson's 1898 and 1907 apa)..
Novender 25, 1922
Sy William T. Davis threugh P. L. Sperr
(2)
The sawe, at a later date. Purdy Place is on the
right.
1924
P. L. Sperr
(3)
A view from Seguine Avenue.
May 14, 1932
P. L. Sperr
